name: Solitaire Master-Fish World
description:
Welcome to the creative Solitaire world ！

Solitaire Master-Fish World is designed based on the traditional solitaire game, but it's different from the classic solitaire game. It will lead you to a magical new world, the underwater world.

In the game, you can not only enjoy the fun of solitaire games, but also enjoy the adventurous underwater world.
Solitaire Master-Fish World can train your brain and improve your IQ. It's a fun puzzle game for everyone.
Thousands of players had already found the fun in Solitaire Master-Fish World. So come and join them!

GAME FEATURES
1.New theme about underwater world
2.Exquisite Back of cards and backgrounds
3.Classic game rules, easy operation
4.Anytime, anywhere, easy to play
5.Thousands of classic solitaire challenges
6.Many props help you complete the game

If you enjoy playing solitaire games and also like world of the ocean, please don't hesitate to download and play the Solitaire Master-Fish World right now!
